verses.verse: The <S%H4633>plans<s%> of the <S%H3820>heart<s%> belong to <S%H120>man<s%>; But the <S%H4617>answer<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
All the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> are <S%H2134>clean<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>; But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8505>weigheth<s%> the <S%H7307>spirits<s%>.
Commit <S%H1556><s%> thy <S%H4639>works<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And thy <S%H4284>purposes<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath <S%H6466>made<s%> everything for its own <S%H4617>end<s%>; <S%H7563>Yea<s%>, even the wicked for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

Every one that is <S%H1362>proud<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: Though <S%H3027>hand<s%> join in <S%H3027>hand<s%>, he shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished<s%>.
By <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> is <S%H3722>atoned<s%> <S%H3374>for<s%>; And by the fear of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> men <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
When a <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H7521>please<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, He maketh even his <S%H341>enemies<s%> to be at peace with <S%H7999>him<s%>.
Better <S%H2896><s%> is a <S%H4592>little<s%>, with <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, Than <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H8393>revenues<s%> with <S%H4941>injustice<s%>.
A <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2803>deviseth<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>; But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3559>directeth<s%> his <S%H6806>steps<s%>.
A divine <S%H7081>sentence<s%> is in the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>; His <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall not transgress in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.
A <S%H4941>just<s%> <S%H3976>balance<s%> and <S%H6425>scales<s%> are <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s; All the <S%H68>weights<s%> of the <S%H3599>bag<s%> are his <S%H4639>work<s%>.
It is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H4428>kings<s%> to <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>; For the <S%H3678>throne<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> by <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
Righteous <S%H6664><s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> are the <S%H7522>delight<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%>; And they <S%H157>love<s%> him that <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H3477>right<s%>.
The <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%> is as <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>; But a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> will pacify <S%H3722>it<s%>.
In the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6440>countenance<s%> is <S%H2416>life<s%>; And his <S%H7522>favor<s%> is as a <S%H5645>cloud<s%> of the latter <S%H4456>rain<s%>.

How much <S%H2896>better<s%> is it to <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> than <S%H2742>gold<s%>! <S%H7069>Yea<s%>, to get <S%H998>understanding<s%> is rather to be <S%H977>chosen<s%> than <S%H3701>silver<s%>.
The <S%H4546>highway<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> is to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>: He that <S%H5341>keepeth<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8104>preserveth<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
Pride <S%H1347><s%> goeth <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7667>destruction<s%>, And a <S%H1363>haughty<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> a <S%H3783>fall<s%>.
Better <S%H2896><s%> it is to be of a <S%H6035>lowly<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> with the <S%H8217>poor<s%>, Than to <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> with the <S%H1343>proud<s%>.
He that giveth <S%H7919>heed<s%> unto the <S%H1697>word<s%> shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>; And whoso <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, happy is <S%H835>he<s%>.
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H995>prudent<s%>; And the <S%H4986>sweetness<s%> of the <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H3254>increaseth<s%> <S%H3948>learning<s%>.
Understanding <S%H7922><s%> is a <S%H4726>well-spring<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> unto him that <S%H1167>hath<s%> <S%H4148>it<s%>; But the correction of <S%H191>fools<s%> is their <S%H200>folly<s%>.
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H7919>instructeth<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, And <S%H3254>addeth<s%> <S%H3948>learning<s%> to his <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
Pleasant <S%H5278><s%> <S%H561>words<s%> are as a <S%H6688>honeycomb<s%>, <S%H4966>Sweet<s%> to the <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and <S%H4832>health<s%> to the <S%H6106>bones<s%>.
There <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> which seemeth <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H6440>unto<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>, But the <S%H319>end<s%> thereof are the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>.
The appetite of the <S%H6001>laboring<s%> <S%H5315>man<s%> <S%H6001>laboreth<s%> for <S%H6310>him<s%>; For his mouth urgeth him <S%H404>thereto<s%>.
A <S%H1100>worthless<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3738>deviseth<s%> <S%H7451>mischief<s%>; And in his <S%H8193>lips<s%> there is as a <S%H6867>scorching<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>.
A <S%H8419>perverse<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7971>scattereth<s%> abroad <S%H4066>strife<s%>; And a <S%H5372>whisperer<s%> <S%H6504>separateth<s%> chief <S%H441>friends<s%>.
A <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%> <S%H6601>enticeth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, And <S%H3212>leadeth<s%> him in a <S%H1870>way<s%> that is not <S%H2896>good<s%>.

He that <S%H6095>shutteth<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, it is to <S%H2803>devise<s%> perverse <S%H8419>things<s%>: He that <S%H7169>compresseth<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H3615>bringeth<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> to <S%H3615>pass<s%>.
The hoary <S%H7872>head<s%> is a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H8597>glory<s%>; It shall be <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

He that is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>; And he that <S%H4910>ruleth<s%> his <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, than he that <S%H3920>taketh<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%>.
The <S%H1486>lot<s%> is <S%H2904>cast<s%> into the <S%H2436>lap<s%>; But the whole <S%H4941>disposing<s%> thereof is of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
